channel.title: thesis on Lina Peters
channel.description: Recent content in thesis on Lina Peters

item.title: Master Thesis
item.description: To complete my master’s degree at the University of Applied Sciences, I wrote my master’s thesis titled An Educational Programming Environment for Teaching the Principles of Machine Learning using LEGO MINDSTORMS. Abstract The German education system is on the verge of raising a generation of digital illiterates. We are in desperate need of up-to-date and motivating teaching content and tools for computer science education to make prevailing topics such as artificial intelligence more accessible to the general public.

item.title: Bachelor Thesis
item.description: In 2016 and 2017 I wrote my thesis about conversational interfaces. My goal was to establish a design and development process for conversational interfaces. I mainly based my theories on Pangaro’s design for conversation, Grice’s cooperative principles and “The Media Equation” by Reeves and Nass. To proof my theoretical concepts I developed a facebook chatbot with wit.ai that was able to look up recipes. The bot was tested in a live trial and in a survey testers were able to judge the effectiveness of the conversation with the chatbot.

item.title: Trial Run for µanthánō and the Educational Concept
item.description: Yesterday (on a Sunday) I coaxed some of my friends to run the first trial for my master thesis with me.

item.title: About Organized Chaos and Chaotic Organization
item.description: What’s crackin'? I haven’t written on here for a long long time. Initially, I wanted to update this blog every week.

item.title: Machine Learning with Lego Mindstorms EV3
item.description: Today I present to you: Another Machine Learning tutorial that no one asked for.

item.title: Doing the Math
item.description: My main task the past two weeks was to figure out the learning objectives for a Machine Learning course.

item.title: Research Proposal
item.description: Initially, I was asked to write the related work abstract for my thesis this week to summarize all the relevant papers and other sources I’ve stumbled upon so far.

item.title: Research
item.description: This week I started my research for my masters thesis. To say “I’m struggling” would be an understatement.
